charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1101_010:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] saw
Cynthia and Ethan engaged in a serious battle.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1101_020: The thrilling, skillful display went on for a while...
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_030:
You should’ve told us you were here,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_040:
I wanted to battle in this new arc suit to 
familiarize myself with this new power 
I’ve acquired.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_050: So I asked Ethan to train with me.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_060:
But Cynthia and Garchomp were so strong that I
could barely keep up...
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_070:
Still, it was a great experience to battle all out
with you, Cynthia!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_080:
Thanks to you, Ethan, I’m getting used to wielding
this power.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_090: Now we can battle on even bigger stages!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_0301_100: You and Garchomp are really in sync!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_0401_110:
Well, we’ve known each other for quite a
while now.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_140:
Garchomp and I have been together since she was
a Gible.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_150:
She used to be such a mischievous handful and
would gnaw on everything! Fabric, books, you
name it!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_160: Huh... Hard to imagine her acting like that now.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_170:
We went through a lot of tough experiences that
made us both stronger together, and she evolved
into the Garchomp she is today.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_180:
I would even say she’s now the linchpin of my
entire team.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_190:
You know, when I think of you, Garchomp is what
comes to mind first!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_200:
Whenever we got into a tough spot, she’d always
turn it into an opportunity.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_210: Maybe I depend on her too much...
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_220: I hope I’m developing as much as she is...
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_240:
You’ve been through a lot together—that’s why
you’re both at the top!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_260: But I want us to go beyond that.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_280:
If we stay satisfied with where we are, we’ll
stop growing.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_290:
If we keep believing in our hidden potential and
taking on battles...
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_300:
we can go beyond our limits and compete on
bigger stages. Wouldn’t you agree?
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_320:
We’ll continue improving ourselves and aiming
even higher!
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_330: And we won’t refuse any sync pair’s challenge.
charaepi_ch0091_90_shirona/2301_1201_350:
Garchomp and I will take you both on anytime
you want!
